name: Climate Changed
description:
The year is 2025 and the world has just about had enough of humans, we now have a continent made solely out of plastic which people have emigrated to in efforts to avoid rising water levels and overpopulation. What a time to be alive, if only there was some way we could've prevented this.

Adapted from my other game, Solitary Refinement.

Click your way to carbon neutral as the last hope for humanity.

I'd appreciate any feedback on the game in general or the direction you'd like it to head.
